doc:
William D. Gordon (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_D._Gordon_(actor) 0 William Douglas Gordon (January 4, 1918 - August 12, 1991) was an American actor, writer, director, story editor and producer. Although he is best known for his writing credits, he acted occasionally on numerous TV series. William_Douglas_Gordon ( January_4_,_1918 - August_12_,_1991 ) was an_American_actor , writer , director , story_editor_and_producer . Although he is_best_known for his_writing_credits , he acted occasionally on numerous_TV_series .
